snippet: A South Korean chemical company has agreed to pay $2 million to settle a criminal complaint alleging attempted theft of a competitor's trade secrets....

headline.print_headline: Korean Firm to Pay $2M to Settle Case in Virginia
headline.main: Korean Firm to Pay $2M to Settle Case in Virginia

lead_paragraph: A South Korean chemical company has agreed to pay $2 million to settle a criminal complaint alleging attempted theft of a competitor's trade secrets.
